text:
@realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar .@realDonaldTrump 

You are right sir, you are all in perfect coordination. 🙄

TRUMP: “Chance there will be no COVID19-19 in Fall”

FAUCI: “We will definitively have COVID-19 In Fall”

(Same press conference, minutes apart). https://t.co/CrxuWYKSRA
